title: Pink Lemonade By Vapetasia
description: On a hot day, Pink Lemonade by Vapetasia is the ideal e-liquid to have in your tank because it has the delightful flavor of refreshing pink lemonade. The flavor on the inhale is quite mellow and will help you relax while providing the smooth, rich flavor you're looking for. When you exhale, the lemonade flavor will truly stand out and amaze you with how accurate it is. The throat is soft and understated. You may easily add this e-juice to your rotation and even use it as your all-day vape because there is no charring or burning sensation.
